name: infix2evm
description: Convert from infix language to evm

scripts.test: npm run compile &&  nearley-test -s NameList -i 'id1, id2, id3' -q lua.js
scripts.test3: npm run compile &&  nearley-test -s S -i 'fun (id, idtwo, idthree) end' -q lua.js
scripts.test4: npm run compile &&  nearley-test -s S -i 'fun (id, idtwo, idthree) do do end end end' -q lua.js
scripts.test5: npm run compile &&  nearley-test -s S -i 'fun (id, idtwo, idthree) do do end; do end end end' -q lua.js
scripts.commandtest: npm run compile; rm auxiliarTree.txt ; npm run generateAuxTree

author: Casiano
